comments.raw_text:
Im not sure if i need to post in bug 673931 or bug 875253 so im posting in both. Sorry. 

I can reproduce this crash in nightly. Steps are
1) Open firefox
2) Go to http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=73K6CTuSWxo
3) Close firefox
4) Crash

Crash report link
https://crash-stats.mozilla.com/report/index/87ced348-3eac-46c9-b048-5362a2131108

Tested mozilla-inbound builds from http://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/mozilla.org/firefox/tinderbox-builds/mozilla-inbound-win32/

http://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/mozilla.org/firefox/tinderbox-builds/mozilla-inbound-win32/1383850066/

no crash

http://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/mozilla.org/firefox/tinderbox-builds/mozilla-inbound-win32/1383850244/

crash
comments.author: kalviskajaks@gmail.com
